jobDescription: Mortgage Center is searching for a Home Equity Assistant to process home equity loans alongside our Home Equity Specialist. This role is critical to ensure the accurate, timely production and closing of home equity mortgage files.Basic responsibilities include...Serving our partner credit union members by ensuring they have all information needed and are kept updated on their loan status.Obtains, reviews, and verifies all credit information required per the home equity guidelines.Reviews supporting documents prior to underwriting and ensures documentation meets program guidelines.Clears title, appraisal, and survey issues.Follows up on outstanding documents and 3rd party order outs.Ensures conditions are received and cleared satisfactorily prior to closing.You might be a good fit if you have...A high school diploma or equivalent. Some college coursework preferred.At least two (2) years of experience in mortgage processing or origination.Excellent organization skills with high attention to detail. High aptitude for learning at a quick pace.Knowledge of RESPA and Truth in Lending and its practical use.An ability to problem-solve and make quick decisions.An Ability to work well independently with minimal supervision.Strong organizational and time management skills.Excellent, professional verbal and written communication skills.Proficiency with computers, to include Microsoft Outlook, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
